external_games.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Sepulchral Guard

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: Sepulchral Guard
summary: Sworn to the God of Death's service, the Sepulchral Warden and his fleshless undying swarm the streets of Shadespire. Their sheer numbers overwhelm all who would oppose them. Unlock this warband and play as the Sepulchral Guard in Warhammer Underworlds: Online.
